/* Запрос для формирования Прихода на склад */ -- параметры операции SELECT *, --единичные поля 1 AS IsPrintNakl, 0 AS IsPrintActPrihod, 0 AS IsPrintActHran, DateDog AS [DateFirst], 0 AS TypeKomiss, dbo.currentBankDate() AS DateIn, 7 AS TypeFirstDoc, 1 AS IsMakeProv, NomerDog AS NumbFirstDoc, (SELECT TOP 1 ID FROM tpd_Main WHERE DebitAccount = thdp.ClaimAccount ORDER BY ID DESC) AS TypeOpl, IDClient AS IDClientPostav, 10000514761 AS UtvSign FROM thoz_DogovorPayments AS thdp INNER JOIN top_Chains AS toc ON toc.ID = thdp.IDChainDog WHERE thdp.ID IN (31,32,33)
-- табличные данные SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(255), FORMATMESSAGE('%s, %s, %s (%s)', thdp.ExpenseAccount, FORMATMESSAGE('%d.%d', MONTH(CurrentDate), YEAR(CurrentDate)), DogType, RentSubject)) AS NameTowar, 8 AS TypeIn,tlaa.ID AS NumbSklad, thdp.ExpenseAccount AS AccountUchet, 8 AS IDIzm,1 AS Kol,(PaySummaDog - PayVATAmount) AS Cena, VATRate AS TypeNalog, PaySummaDog AS SumWithNDS, PayVATAmount AS SumNDS, thdp.IDClient AS IDClientPostav, 10000000001 AS IDCountry FROM thoz_DogovorPayments AS thdp INNER JOIN top_Chains AS toc ON toc.ID = thdp.IDChainDog INNER JOIN tla_Account AS tlaa ON tlaa.Account = thdp.ExpenseAccount WHERE thdp.Id IN (31,32,33)
